definition: to hear suddenly/to learn of sth unexpectedly

sentences.english: Suddenly I hear singing from the bank.
Suddenly he heard a rustle in the peony pavilion and someone sighing deeply.
sentences.chinese: 他忽聞有人在牡丹亭畔長吁短嘆。

sentences.english: Then he heard a sacred mountain in the sea.
sentences.chinese: 忽聞海上有仙山，山在虛無縹緲間。

sentences.english: Suddenly he heard a rustle in the peony pavilion and some sighing deeply.
sentences.chinese: 忽聞有人在牡丹亭畔，長吁短嘆。

sentences.english: Suddenly I hear the singing from ashore.
